snippet.title: Area D (Longplay): The Complete Edition
snippet.description:
The complete edition of my longplay of «Area D» game. The original version was recorded as separate pieces because of the bugs and glitches (this game has many), but since the pieces were too short, I've decided to combine them in a single video. You may watch the original version through the playlist, or this one. This one was edited a little though to look like a one-piece playthrough (even though it's not). Also, for proper info about the videos, hints and comments, check the original videos here:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BShrtB5r7XY&list=PL6756FDC78DA826C2
